1. To run in local
    bundle exec jekyll serve
2. To publish to production
    JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build
3. To install gems
    gem install bundler jekyll




<div class="card" style="width: 20rem;">
  <img src="/assets/images/2020-11-19.png" class="card-img-top" alt="2020-11-19.png">
  <div class="card-body">
    <h5 class="card-title">Go Concurrency - A typical production use</h5>
    <p class="card-text">Go handles concurrency in a slightly different way than the other programming languages. The effective Go has a slogan around their new concept "Do not communicate by sharing memory; instead, share memory by communicating".</p>
    <a href="#" class="btn btn-primary stretched-link">Go somewhere</a>
  </div>
</div>
